div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 274 Athens (Pnyx), 1937 Burial: c. 140-130 B.C. (T); c. 87 (Price) Contents: 243 AE. From excavations Athens: 2nd-3rd cent. (as Svoronos pl. 22, 62 ff.) 93 New Style (as Sv. pl. 22, 53-8 [5]; pl. 81 [42]; pl. 24, 62 ff. [46]) 148 "Delian" types (as Sv. pl. 107, 50 ff. [134]; 75 ff. [4]) Disposition: Athens (Agora) Hesperia, Suppl. 7 (1943), pp. 14, 24-7 Thompson, Athens, pp. 526 ff. Price, NC 1964, pp. 27-36
